Text: Indeed, banks like the Spain-headquartered Santander and Japan-based Nomura are showing increasing interest in the cryptocurrency market. Santander recently used ethereum-based tokens to issue and settle a $20 million bond.
Cause: Indeed, banks like the Spain-headquartered Santander and Japan-based Nomura are showing increasing interest in the cryptocurrency market.
Effect: Santander recently used ethereum-based tokens to issue and settle a $20 million bond.
Sentence: <e1>Indeed, banks like the Spain-headquartered Santander and Japan-based Nomura are showing increasing interest in the cryptocurrency market.</e1> <e2>Santander recently used ethereum-based tokens to issue and settle a $20 million bond.</e2>
